promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic ostrich normal-type pokemon with a dark beak. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or ostrich. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Grassbeakon, a a gigantic epic ostrich normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Boost Dash, Deep Sea Boring. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ostrich", "normal" or "Grassbeakon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, ostrich-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: This colossal avian dwells in lush meadows, effortlessly accelerating with Boost Dash to forage. Remarkably, it can also bore into oceans for hidden treasures.
